name: Rafael Prikladnicki
content: << Rafael Prikladnicki >> PUCRS R A F A E L      P R I K L A D N I C K I HIGHLIGHTS - Associate Professor, PUCRS, Brazil, 2004 - present - Former Director at TECNOPUC (PUCRS's Science and Technology Park), Dec/2013 - Nov/2020 - Former Director at Technology Management Agency at PUCRS, Dec/2010 - Nov/20213 - Teaches Entrepreneurship, Agile Methods, Remote Work, Project Mgt, Digital Transformation, Software Engineering - Consultant in Agile Methods, Remote Work, Project Management, Process Improvement - Angel investor - Business partnert at ABO Academy - Project Management Professional (PMP), 2005 - Agile Certified Practitioner (PMI-ACP), 2011 - Certified Scrum Master (SCM), 2012 - Disciplined Agile Senior Scrum Master (DASSM), 2020 - H-Index = 38 (Google Scholar, Aug 2022). Citations have increased by 85% from Aug 2018 to Aug 2022 - Most cited Brazilian in his two main areas of research (Google Scholar): global software engineering (4th overall) and agile software development (8th overall) -
